name: Kill Billy
description:
Billy is an cruel mobster who has always tried to take over the city. In his conquest he destroyed a lot of familes, businesses and has gained a rep. However, while doing so he messed with the wrong person... YOU! Play as different characters to thwart his plans. Fight with all his followers to get to him and give him a taste of his own medicine.
Kill Billy is a fun 2D fighting game with multiple characters to choose from. Climb up towards Billy by defeating all his followers one by one and finish his reign. Powerups can be used as a backup in case of emergencies.

This fighting game is more than mashing of buttons, it uses a time bar displayed at the top. Time the tap correctly to do the best attack. Red is the highest power attack. To attack, Tap on right side of the screen. To block, tap and hold on the left side of the screen. Defeat the opponent by pushing them off the edge of the rooftop or let the timer run out when the opponent is on their half of the rooftop!

- Fight with the mob family of Billy and defeat them to climb up the ranks and finally fight with Billy
- Bunch of heroes to choose from with different abilities and stats. Unlock all as you play through
- Some surprise Call for Backup powers can be used incase needed
- Play multiplayer with friends and frenemies. Keep up the challenge!
Let the fight begin!
